basics.name: Your Sidebar Name
basics.summary: Currently employed at Red Brick University. Short biography for the left-hand sidebar

work.company: The University of Texas at Austin
UC San Diego Cognitive Tools Lab
highlights: Completed an honors thesis investigating how abstract causal knowledge about intuitive physics can be transmitted between individuals through natural language, and identifying what properties characterize a good intuitive physics explanation, submitted to CogSci2022
Assisted the graduate student in studying how people can infer multiple physical variables simultaneously and compose them to generalize in a novel scenario

work.company: UC San Diego Language Comprehension Lab
highlights: Collaborated to study the effect of verbal reduplication on event conceptualization and semantic priming on character identification
Coded experiments in JavaScript, HTML and CSS, analyzed experimental data in R, and conducted in-person and online experiments
Organized social events such as movie nights for team bonding

work.position: Professional and Academic Development Board Committee
highlights: Contacted professionals in both academia and industry to attend CSSA-hosted conferences and monthly talks
Organized social events such as care packages giveaways for club members
